string-array.name: male_recommendations
string-array.item: Ok mate, you are within the recommended limit
Dude, I\'ll stop drinking if I was you
Ok, you\'ve had enough... drink some water
Feel that weird sensation in your fingertips?... That\'s because you\'ve had too much!!! stop!
Ok that\'s it! put that pint down, go home and sleep!... and leave some aspirins and water nearby

string-array.name: female_recommendations
string-array.item: Oh you are just fine! Have I told you you look great?
Girl, you\'re within the recommended limit. Oh! you have beautiful eyes!!!
Ok you\'re drinking a little over the recommended units of alcohol... what about some water?
This is a little bit too much... let\'s stop
I guess you are starting to feel kinda funny... THAT\'S BECAUSE YOU\'RE DRINKING TOO MUCH!!!
Do you know that too much alcohol makes you fat?... Ok... that was mean... I just want you to stop drinking...
Ok that\'s it! put that pint down, go home and sleep!... and leave some aspirins and water nearby
